Yoshida, E. J., Luu, M., Clair, J. M.-S., Mita, A. C., Scher, K. S., Lu, D. J., Nguyen, A. T., Shiao, S. L., Ho, A. S., & Zumsteg, Z. S. (2020). Stage i HPV-positive oropharyngeal cancer: Should all patients receive similar treatments? Cancer, 126(1), 58–66. https://doi.org/10.1002/cncr.32501
